meanings.definition: Capable of existing or working together without conflict
meanings.sent1: The two puzzle pieces fit together compatibly.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting are compatibly blended.
meanings.sent3: The siblings played compatibly without any arguments.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the machine turned compatibly, ensuring smooth operation.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients in the recipe must mix compatibly for the dish to turn out well.

meanings.definition: In a way that is suitable or consistent with something else
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the settings compatibly with the requirements.
meanings.sent2: The new software integrates compatibly with the existing programs.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked compatibly alongside the dog, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed compatibly with the rhythm of the dancers' movements.
meanings.sent5: The new furniture fits compatibly in the room, enhancing its appearance.
